title:
Sparse Bounds for Discrete Maximal Functions associated with
  Birch-Magyar averages
authors:
Ankit Bhojak, Surjeet Singh Choudhary, Siddhartha Samanta, Saurabh
  Shrivastava
abstract:
In this article, we study discrete maximal function associated with the
Birch-Magyar averages over sparse sequences. We establish sparse domination
principle for such operators. As a consequence, we obtain $\ell^p$-estimates
for such discrete maximal function over sparse sequences for all $p>1$. The
proof of sparse bounds is based on scale-free $\ell^p-$improving estimates for
the single scale Birch-Magyar averages.
